entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 4:30 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 5.0°C
Wind: 25 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight. Fog patches. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 25 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
